subject: Speedskating
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Rebekah Bradford got a second chance after falling and used it to clinch an Olympic berth in the 1,000 meters at the United States Speedskating Championships in Kearns, Utah.
snippet: Rebekah Bradford got a second chance after falling and used it to clinch an Olympic berth in the 1,000 meters at the United States Speedskating Championships in Kearns, Utah.
